mapper.update: update work_overtime set award=#{award},type=#{type} where data=#{data}
mapper.select: select count(log_id) from logs where log_date=#{time} and log_state=1

select DATE_FORMAT(l.log_date,'%Y-%m-%d') date,u.name,u.phone,w.type,l.log_award from work_overtime w left join `logs` l on l.log_date=w.`data` left join user u on l.log_userId=u.phone where l.log_date=#{time} and l.log_state=1 limit #{page},10
select count(log_id) from logs where log_date between #{startTime} and #{endTime}

select l.log_id,DATE_FORMAT(l.log_date,'%Y-%m-%d') date,u.name,u.phone,l.log_award,log_state from logs l left join user u on l.log_userId=u.phone where l.log_date between #{startTime} and #{endTime} limit #{page},4
mapper.update: update logs set log_state=#{state} where log_id=#{logId}
